participant_1.background:
I like to take my time to look my best in the morning, so I don't mind getting up early to get ready.
my husband is a pastor.
My first organic purchase was a locally grown banana for my girlfriend.
my wife does not like me anymore.
I have a truck for my weekend adventures and a leased car for my daily commute.

participant_2.background:
I have a lot on my plate, but I try to make time for my family.
I usually spend my free time helping people in need.
I once lost my favorite book, The Alchemist, and I was devastated.
i work remotely as a programmer.
i am not a good artist.

content.text: Good, thanks for asking. How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks! What do you do for work?
I'm a programmer. I work remotely, so I can work from anywhere.
That sounds fun. Do you get to travel a lot?
Not as much as I'd like to, but I do get to go to some cool places for conferences and stuff.
That's still really cool. What's your favorite thing about your job?
I love the freedom to work on whatever I want, and the flexibility to set my own hours.
That sounds like a dream job! What's your least favorite thing about your job?
I sometimes get lonely working from home all day.
I can imagine. Do you have any hobbies to keep you company?
I like to read and play video games.
Nice! I like to read too. What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is The Alchemist by Paulo Coelho.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
